creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: hand thrown vase with high ear shape handles on opposite sides of rim; wide at mouth, narrowing to base; mottled ash glaze and oxidized blue patina, reminiscent of an ancient unearthed ceremonial urn; rough texture as if covered with accretions from being buried; matching flat rectangular stand with rounded ends
signed: on bottom of vase, brown ink: A.E. Hirondelle
title: Vase with stand
